tool_description: Real time climate change news from a number of newsSites.
name: real-time-climate-info
title: real-time-climate-info

api_list.name: Get from a particular news site
api_list.description: Fetches over a particualr website for climate related news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-climate-info.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-climate-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-climate-info.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspapername}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-climate-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all News
api_list.description: Get all News  of climate change all over the web
